channel.title: Need g00d coder please pweeez!=]
channel.description:
Hey, I Need a coder who can spare me probbly about 10-60Mins..[Not sure how long as i'm a rubbish coder] Well..Heres a few things i would like you to do..If possible. :)
[b][i]This Server is Adventurescape..Hope that's not a problem..[/i][/b]
-Make lvl-ing Slower..Because when you attack a monster for example. Your attack/defence/str/hit-Pionts go up [b][i]REALLY[i][/b] Fast..If you could change ths so it's a lil'Bit harder that would be [b]great![/b]
-[i]maybe[/i] Fix Some Stuff like..Bugs? Anythin' yooh think shouldn't be there.
-Oh and..I Would like to make myself a admin/Owner on it[Dunno how to do it..I know..Noobie...] My user [i]Will[/i] be xB L A D Ex in the server.
-I dunno if it's possible..but...Yooh know when yooh 1st start playin' the server as a [i]new[/i] Character you start with armour like dragon and all that..Could yooh possibly change it to just .. Full Bronze, Str ammy and bronze scimmy? `n' When yooh first start yooh get to choose what your character looks like. Like normal runescape - That would be great!!
-Every time i advertise or somethin' The people who help me Will [b]Allways be in the credits for great help[/b] -And i dunno what else..Maybe yooh can like decide to change somthin' And ask? ;)
P.S This is ALOT of coding..Some people might just think i'm takin' advantage of good coders..I'm not im askin' Nicley for some help so i can make a good server for people to have fun and a great time on,[i]Breaks between revising, Homework?[/i] :rolleyes: ;)
-Thank Yooh So Much For Your Time To Read This && I Hope Someone Wil Help And Spare Some Time.
- xB L A D Ex -
[size=20pt]I'll Be extremly happy for your help and you will have all the credits[/size] :)
P.S.S Speak to me on :- Badboylew4eva@hotmail.co.uk 2 speak to me. Thank Yooh!

Lol I only code for RS cash but goodluck finding someone

item.title: Need g00d coder please pweeez!=]
item.dc:creator: @xB_L_A_D_Ex xB L A D Ex
item.description:
@xB_L_A_D_Ex wrote:

Hey, I Need a coder who can spare me probbly about 10-60Mins…[Not sure how long as i’m a rubbish coder]
Well…Heres a few things i would like you to do…If possible.

This Server is Adventurescape…Hope that’s not a problem…

-Make lvl-ing Slower…Because when you attack a monster for example. Your attack/defence/str/hit-Pionts go up [i]REALLY[i] Fast…If you could change ths so it’s a lil’Bit harder that would be great!

-maybe Fix Some Stuff like…Bugs? Anythin’ yooh think shouldn’t be there.

-Oh and…I Would like to make myself a admin/Owner on it[Dunno how to do it…I know…Noobie…]
My user Will be xB L A D Ex in the server.

-I dunno if it’s possible…but…Yooh know when yooh 1st start playin’ the server as a new Character you start with armour like dragon and all that…Could yooh possibly change it to just … Full Bronze, Str ammy and bronze scimmy? `n’ When yooh first start yooh get to choose what your character looks like. Like normal runescape - That would be great!!

-Every time i advertise or somethin’ The people who help me Will Allways be in the credits for great help
-And i dunno what else…Maybe yooh can like decide to change somthin’ And ask?

P.S This is ALOT of coding…Some people might just think i’m takin’ advantage of good coders…I’m not im askin’ Nicley for some help so i can make a good server for people to have fun and a great time on,Breaks between revising, Homework? :rolleyes:

-Thank Yooh So Much For Your Time To Read This && I Hope Someone Wil Help And Spare Some Time.

  • xB L A D Ex -

[size=20pt]I’ll Be extremly happy for your help and you will have all the credits[/size]

P.S.S Speak to me on :- Badboylew4eva@hotmail.co.uk 2 speak to me. Thank Yooh!
